analysis.description:
Reentrancy in HireGoCrowdsale.calculatePurchaseAndBonuses (/unique_chucks/9/0x88d94bb541257000fe7f01989a58cb70ba06d7ac.sol#549-582):
	External calls:
	- checkAndMint(_tokens) (/unique_chucks/9/0x88d94bb541257000fe7f01989a58cb70ba06d7ac.sol#571-573)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- contributors (/unique_chucks/9/0x88d94bb541257000fe7f01989a58cb70ba06d7ac.sol#573-574)
	- tokensDistributed (/unique_chucks/9/0x88d94bb541257000fe7f01989a58cb70ba06d7ac.sol#579)
	- totalWeiRaised (/unique_chucks/9/0x88d94bb541257000fe7f01989a58cb70ba06d7ac.sol#576-579)
change in HireGoCrowdsale.calculatePurchaseAndBonuses (/unique_chucks/9/0x88d94bb541257000fe7f01989a58cb70ba06d7ac.sol#558) is a local variable never initialiazed

HireGoCrowdsale.sendOrderedTokens (/unique_chucks/9/0x88d94bb541257000fe7f01989a58cb70ba06d7ac.sol#444-453) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(investor,tokensCount) (/unique_chucks/9/0x88d94bb541257000fe7f01989a58cb70ba06d7ac.sol#450-452)

HireGoCrowdsale.distributeForFoundersAndTeam (/unique_chucks/9/0x88d94bb541257000fe7f01989a58cb70ba06d7ac.sol#509-519) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(wallet,to_send) (/unique_chucks/9/0x88d94bb541257000fe7f01989a58cb70ba06d7ac.sol#516-519)

HireGoCrowdsale.distributeForBountiesAndAdvisors (/unique_chucks/9/0x88d94bb541257000fe7f01989a58cb70ba06d7ac.sol#519-523) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(wallet,to_send) (/unique_chucks/9/0x88d94bb541257000fe7f01989a58cb70ba06d7ac.sol#522-523)

HireGoCrowdsale.checkAndMint (/unique_chucks/9/0x88d94bb541257000fe7f01989a58cb70ba06d7ac.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(this,required.sub(totalSupply)) (/unique_chucks/9/0x88d94bb541257000fe7f01989a58cb70ba06d7ac.sol)

HireGoCrowdsale.sendOrderedTokens has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.transfer(investor,tokensCount) (/unique_chucks/9/0x88d94bb541257000fe7f01989a58cb70ba06d7ac.sol#450-452)

HireGoCrowdsale.refundInvestors has external calls inside a loop:
	- investor.transfer(contributedWei) (/unique_chucks/9/0x88d94bb541257000fe7f01989a58cb70ba06d7ac.sol#482-483)

Reentrancy in HireGoCrowdsale.calculatePurchaseAndBonuses (/unique_chucks/9/0x88d94bb541257000fe7f01989a58cb70ba06d7ac.sol#549-582):
	External calls:
	- checkAndMint(_tokens) (/unique_chucks/9/0x88d94bb541257000fe7f01989a58cb70ba06d7ac.sol#571-573)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- orderedTokens (/unique_chucks/9/0x88d94bb541257000fe7f01989a58cb70ba06d7ac.sol#579-580)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/9/0x88d94bb541257000fe7f01989a58cb70ba06d7ac.sol#574-576)
